body:
### What is it?

MM Curses is a project aiming at bringing a full movie manager to the CLI, usable entirely without X.
It is targeted at GUI-haters, Curses-lovers or just movie-lovers who want to try a new way to enjoy their favorite films.
It uses mplayer as a backend by default, but you will be able to personalize it as much as you want in the future!

### How to help?

You can clone the repository with a simple
```
$ git clone git://github.com/simsor/moviesmanager-curses.git
```

Feel free to send bug reports, pull requests or to fork the project if you're interested!

### Contact

If you have some really serious problem, like my application eating your cat / your family / your car / whatever, you can contact me on twitter @simsor or send me an e-mail.
name: MoviesManager Curses
tagline: Manage your movies, play them, the TTY way!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
